TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SqlCertificateDatabase extends MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateDatabase

Docs.summary: An abstract X.509 certificate database built on generic SQL storage.

remarks.para: An X.509 certificate database is used for storing certificates, metdata related to the certificates (such as encryption algorithms supported by the associated client), certificate revocation lists (CRLs), and private keys.
This particular database uses SQLite to store the data.
